answerText: Johnny Got His Gun[10] Johnny Got His Gun is by this American author and screenwriter who was one of the Hollywood Ten, blacklisted for his communist sympathies. He also wrote Eclipse.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Chris Ray - FINAL | 21 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The main character of this work eventually realizes he has no legs, arms, or face. For 10 points each: [10] Name this anti-war novel about Joe Bonham.
